title: Purse, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, satin, running and couching stitches on plain weave foundation; bobbin lace
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: White ribbed silk semi-circular purse with drawstring top, embroidered with polychrome silks in floral designs and edged in silver bobbin lace. Lined with blue taffeta; braded green silk cord at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, satin, running and couching stitches on plain weave foundation; bobbin lace. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-11.
